pullRequest.title: EQL: Allow null tiebreakers inside ordinals/sequences
pullRequest.bodyText:
Align Ordinal comparator to consider nulls last (higher) in tiebreakers.
Add unit tests to Ordinal comparisons and criterion extraction.
Fix #64706

commit.message:
EQL: Allow null tiebreakers inside ordinals/sequences

Align Ordinal comparator to consider nulls last (higher) in tiebreakers.
Add unit tests to Ordinal comparisons and criterion extraction.

Fix #64706

nodes.bodyText: I think using "tie" as the short version of "tiebreaker" is confusing and makes the test method names a bit cryptic for someone who is not familiar with the code. "tie" has a meaning and, while it's a short version of "tiebreaker", the reader will not think of "tiebreaker" first.
